"}, {"question": "How does the scheme contribute to the mobility of differently-abled individuals? ", "answer": "The scheme facilitates the mobility of differently-abled persons by providing them with free bus passes, promoting independent travel within Puducherry. 

"}, {"question": "Can non-residents of Puducherry avail of this scheme? ", "answer": "No, the scheme is exclusive to individuals who have been residents of the Union Territory of Puducherry for at least 5 years.
